item.description:
Thursday, June 11th - 7:30 p.m.

New format for Boston Meditation meet up. For each meeting there will be a specific topic. The June topic is "Healthy ways to release stress". Each time we will have a guided meditation that is related to the topic and there will be time to talk about our experiences or insights.

This meet up will meet for about an hour and a half.

I am looking forward being with you,

Peace,
Rev Christine
617-794-8208
item.how_to_find_us: We're just around the corner from the Stony Brook T stop on the Orange line.
item.name: June Boston Meditation Meetup
